MrSpatula...... please explain ur actions to me as I'm a new uploader...

Legendary movie. However I recommend you download one of the bigger versions. This isn't a pretty movie already, and being 583mb (while being just over 2 hours) doesn't help with that. Also, about half-way through the audio becomes unsynced from the video by 1 sec. So it ruins (just a little bit) some of the most powerful speeches in film history
Thanks for the tip Zenit. Appreciate your help
